lines.text: Don't you realize? The next time you see sky, it'll be over another town. The next time you take a test, it'll be in some other school. Our parents, they want the best of stuff for us. But right now, they got to do what's right for them. Because it's their time. Their time! Up there! Down here, it's our time. It's our time down here. That's all over the second we ride up Troy's bucket.
[Mouth is "translating" Mrs. Walsh's instructions for Rosalita]
Pants and shirts go in the... oh, forget about it. Just throw everything into cardboard boxes. Clark, can you really translate all that?
For sure, Mrs. Walsh.

[in Spanish]
The marijuana goes in the top drawer. The cocaine and speed go in the second drawer. And the heroin goes in the bottom drawer. Always separate the drugs.
Hey, you guys!
[the Fratellis are interrogating Chunk]

[grabs Chunk by the throat]
Hey, kid! I want you to spill your guts, tell us everything!
Everything?
*Everything*.

[sobbing]
Everything. OK, I'll talk! In third grade, I cheated on my history exam. In fourth grade, I stole my uncle Max's toupee and I glued it on my face when I was Moses in my Hebrew School play. In fifth grade, I knocked my sister Edie down the stairs and I blamed it on the dog... when my mom sent me to the summer camp for fat kids and then they served lunch I got nuts and I pigged out and they kicked me out!
[much later]

hua-hua-hua-huaaaaaaa - and then I dumped it over the side, all over the people in the audience. And then, this was horrible, all the people started getting sick and throwing up all over each other. And I never felt so bad in my entire life!

[amused]
I'm beginning to like this kid, Ma!

[tired of Chunk's stalling]
Hit puree!
Goonies never say die!
I can't tell... if it's an "A sharp" or if it's a "B flat"!
Heh, if you hit the wrong note, we'll all "B flat!"
[Chunk is running toward the road in the dead of night to find help]
I'm not all alone in the dark. I like the dark. I love the dark.
[He ducks and crawls under a tree branch]
But I hate nature! I HATE nature!
Brand, God put that rock there for a purpose... and, um... I'm not so sure you should, um... move it...
Watch this.
[Data's father takes a camera out of his jacket and proceeds to take a picture but the film falls out. Andy starts laughing]
He's just like his father.

[in Chinese]
That's okay daddy. You can't hug a photograph.

[in Chinese]
You are my greatest invention.
Now, Rosalita, this is the attic. Mr. Walsh doesn't like anybody up here, ever. I guess that's why it's always open.

[in Spanish]
Translation - never go up there. It's filled with Mr. Walsh's *sexual torture devices*.

[Data comes flying into the house knocking over everyone and Chunk grabs the statue of Michaelangelo's David]
Hey! I bet you guys think I was going to drop it huh? I know you would think that from good ol Chunk
[Places the statue on the table and it falls off]
You Idiot!
Oh my god!
[runs over and picks up the statue]
Look look! It's not broken. It's perfect! Ha ha!

[sees that the statue's penis has broken off]
Oh my GOD! That's my mom's most favorite piece!
[tries to put it back on]
Oh my god.
You wouldn't be here if it wasn't.
Shut up Mouth!
Shut up Mouth.

[to Rosalita]
This is my supply closet. You'll find everything you need - brooms, dust pans, insect spray... I would really like the house clean when they tear it down. Clark, can you translate?

["translating" to Rosalita]
If you do a bad job you'll be locked in here with the cockroaches for two weeks without food or water.

[to Mouth]
You are so fluent in Spanish. That was so nice of you.
"Nice" is my middle name, Mrs. Walsh.
You know your voice is kind of nice when your mouth isn't screwing it up.
Yeah and you looks are kind of pretty. When your face isn't screwing it up.

[to Mouth]
You're so quiet all of a sudden you're the one they call "Mouth" aren't you?

[mumbling]
Mmm mm!

[Mama Fratelli proceeds to pull a very long pearl necklace out of Mouth's mouth]
Oh my god! OH MY GOD! Is that all?

[mumbles]
Mmm hmm.
[Mama Frateli smacks Mouth on the back of his head and he spits out the rest of his share of the jewels]

[Rosalita screaming in spanish]
What's she saying Mouth? Translate.
No pen. No write. No sign!
No dad don't sign it!
[Rosalita runs over to Mrs Walsh and pulls out her hand and empties Mikey's marble bag]
Dad! Dad! It's my marble bag. The Fratelis forgot to check it. I emptied out all of my marbles and put the jewels in. We don't have to leave the boon docks!

[ripping up the foreclosure document]
They'll be no more signing today or ever again.
[cheering]
Is this supposed to be water?
It's wet, ain't it? Drink it!
[Brand and Andy are about to kiss after falling down]
Shame, shame!
I know your name!
Come on, Brand! Slip her the tongue!
Oh, that's disgusting. Now I can't even look.

[to One-Eyed Willie]
Hi Willie. Oh, I'm Mike Walsh. You've been expecting me, haven't you? Well I made it. I beat you. I got here in one piece... so far.
[lifts up Willie's patch]
So... that's why they call you One-Eyed Willie... One-Eyed Willie.
[takes a breath from his breathalizer]
We had a long comment, huh, Willie? You know something, Willie? You're the first Goonie.
[the rest of the Goonies show up]
Yo. Hi guys. How's it going? This is Willie... One-Eyed Willie. Say hi, Willie. Those are my friends... the Goonies.
[pauses]
How long have you guys been standing there?
Long enough, Mikey. Long enough.
C'mon Mikey, give me a lickery kiss!
[Chunk and Sloth are chained up together]
Hey, mister? Are you hungry? I got a Baby Ruth.
Ruth! Ruth! Baby! Ruth!
Here you go.
[Chunk tosses the candy bar to Sloth and it hits him in the head. Both scream]
I'm sorry, mister! I'm sorry!
[Sloth rips his chains out of the wall and goes to pick up the candy bar. Then, he realizes he's free]
Gee, mister. You're even hungrier than I am.

[examining coins in the well]
President Lincoln... George Washington... Martin Sheen...
Martin Sheen? That's President Kennedy, you idiot!
Well, same difference. I mean, he played Kennedy once.

[the Fratelis come across the bones of Chester Copperpot, Jake checks his wallet]
Niente. Kids must've cleaned him out.
Sure, right before they ate him!
Stupid.
Let's...
-get out of...
-here!
Like now!
There it is. Okay, Jake, you first.
I ain't going down there, Mama. Are you kidding me?

[pulls out her gun and points it at Jake]
GO!
I can't argue with that, Mama.
[last lines]
Bye, Willy. Thanks.
Hey I've got a great idea you guys! Slick shoes!

[together]
Slick shoes? ARE YOU CRAZY?
DATA!

[Jake tries to push Francis over the log]
DON'T PUSH JAKE!
I'm not pushing Francis now hurry up!

[after Francis slips and falls on his crotch]
Francis sweetheart are you okay?

[High pitched voice]
NOOOOOOO!

[Andy has accidentally kissed Mikey]
OK, you kissed. Now tell.
There's something weird.
What? What is it?
Does Brand wear braces?

[Stef bursts into laughter]
Why are you laughing? Stef, it was beautiful.
Next time you kiss him, do it with your eyes open. It's a whole different experience.
Hello, Sheriff's Office? I'd like to report a murder!
Hold on, hold on a minute. Is that you again, Lawrence?
Listen, Sheriff, I know I've jerked you around before, but this is for real now. I'm in the Fratellis' basement, with this guy...
Rocky Road? Heh Heh!
Yeah, like that time you told me about the fifty Iranian terrorists who took over all the Sizzler steakhouses in the city?
Sloth, get back here! Sloth!
Just like that last prank about all those little creatures that multiply when you throw water on them?
[as Chunk follows Sloth, the phone cord rips out of the wall. The Sheriff hears a dial tone]
Lawrence?
Data where are you going?
I'm setting booty traps.
You mean booby traps?
THATS WHAT I SAID! BOOBY TRAPS! God. These Guys!
Brand... What happened to your braces?
Braces? I don't wear braces, Mikey wears bra... Mikey! That little...
Shhh!
[kisses him again]
Andy, you goonie!

[Watching Brand]
Brand is being so sweet to me.
Oh come on, come on! Where are you? You're in the clouds and we are in a basement!

[yanks off his toupee, as bats swarm]
Watch your hair! Watch your hair! They're goin' for the hair!
Look, how's that? How's that?
Oh, you idiot! You glued it on upside down!
You dork! If God made it like that, you'd all be pissing in your faces!
Looks fine to me.
Francis, the lock. The lock!
Let go of the handle.
I don't have the handle! Open the lock!
Jake, up! Come on, move it!
[Mikey calls for a bathroom break]
Okay, this is the little boys' room, and that cave over there is the little girls' room.
[Brandon heads to a different cave]
Brand, where're you going?
This is the *men's* room.
Get the rope here. Slothy, Slothy, jumprope Slothy.
What do you mean jump rope?
Jumprope! Jumprope.
[singing]
Ring around the rosie, pocket full of posies...
[Jake and Francis swing around Sloth to tie him up]

[Sloth rips off his shirt revealing a T-Shirt with the Superman 'S' on the front]
Sloth!
We're in deep shit now, Francis.
Oh, shit!

[whispers softly]
Let's go this way.
What are you? Crazy? They're here.

[hysterically]
They're here, they're here, they're here, they're here.
[Brand covers Andy's mouth]

[whispering]
There they are. Right there.

[shouting to the others]
It's the Fratellies. This way. Come on we've got to move! Let's go you guys. Don't fall behind. Let's move.
This is ridiculous. It's crazy. I feel like I'm babysitting, except I'm not getting paid.

Listen, okay? You guys'll never believe me. There was two cop cars, okay? And they were chasing this four-wheel deal, this real neat ORV, and there were bullets flying all over the place. It was the most amazing thing I ever saw!
More amazing than the time Michael Jackson come over to your house to use the bathroom.
More amazing than the time you saved those old people from that nursing home fire, right?
Yeah, and I bet it was even more amazing than the time you ate your weight in Godfather's pizza, right?
Okay, Brand. Michael Jackson didn't come over to my house to use the bathroom. But his sister did.
[the Goonies are collecting coins from a wishing well]
Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, stop, stop! You can't do this.
Why?
Why?
Because these are somebody else's wishes. They're somebody else's dreams.
Yeah, but you know what? This one, this one right here. This was my dream, my wish. And it didn't come true. So I'm taking it back. I'm taking them all back.
Senior Jerk Alert!
Kids suck.
Brandon Walsh! If you don't bring those kids back I'm going to commit Harri Krishna!
That's Hari Kari, Ma!
I'm gonna hit you so hard that when you wake up your clothes will be out of style!
Look at this. They've got Misissippi Mud and they've got Chocolate Eruption and they've got what?
[Everyone screams]
It's a stiff.
[Everyone screams and drops the dead body]
Do you think there's really any treasure here?
Andy this whole ship is a treasure.

[to Andy after she hits a wrong note on the piano]
It's OK, you're a Goonie and Goonies always make mistakes... just don't make any more.
You know, I just want to say thank you. For offering to save my life.
Wow! Thank you it's a real moment. You know your voice is kind of nice when your mouth isn't screwing it up.
Yeah and your looks kind of pretty. When your face isn't screwing it up.
Sorry, Dad, we had our hands on the future, but we gave it up just to save our own lives.

[after Sloth kisses him]
Man! You smell like Phys Ed!
[Chunk and Sloth come across the out-of-control pipes]
Yeah. Mikey's been through here, all right.
[Sloth grabs some pipes and pushes them up. He hears a car crash, a woman scream and sirens]
Uh-oh.
[Chunk drinks from a water cooler while the others try to figure out how to get through the floor]
I've got an idea. Why don't we just spread chocolate all over the floor and let Chunk eat his way through?
Okay, Mouth. I've taken all I can stand... and I can't stand no more!
[Chunk steps towards Mouth, knocks over the cooler, and tries to right it]
I got it! I got it! I got it!
[Chunk rights the cooler, but the bottle falls off and breaks]
I don't got it.
You klutz!
Hope it's not a deposit bottle!

[in Spanish; subtitled]
My God, I'm in a crazy house!
Mama!
Come to mama Slothy, come on hmm?
Mama, you've been bad.
Oh, Slothy. I may have been bad. I may have kept you chained up in that room but it was for your own good.
Yeah!
You remember that song I used to sing to you?
Yeah!
You were little back then?
[singing]
Rock-a-bye baby on the tree top. When the wind blows the cradle will rock. When the bough breaks the cradle will fall...
Break! Fall!
No! I only dropped once.
Ahh!
Well, maybe twice. No Sloth! Put me down!
You know Sloth, if you sit too close to the TV, you're going hurt your eyes.
Eh!
Jake leave him alone!
whats all the stuff in the attic?
It has something to do with my dad being the assistant curly, curny.

[smacking Mikey on the back of the head]
Curator.
That's what I said.
You know Sloth if you sit too close to the TV you're going hurt your eyes.

[grunting]
Eh!
Jake leave him alone.

[Sirens wailing]
Where are my boys?
Mikey? Brand?
Hi mom. Hi dad. I guess we're in big shit now right?
Hey any of you guys ever hear of Detroit?
No.
Sointenly! Where Motown started. It's also got the highest murder rate in the country.
Well, let me tell you what. That's where we're going when we lose the house tomorrow.
You shut up about that stuff, it'll never happen. My dad will fix it.
Yeah sure he will. If he gets his next 400 paychecks by tommorrow afternoon.
That's wrong Brand! It won't happen.
Now tell me where your other little friends are.

[crying]
The fireplace.
Don't lie to me!
Honest. We went over to Mikey's dads place and we found this map that said that underneath this place there's buried treasure.
Come on, don't give us none of your bullshit stories huh?
Sloth stop that.
Do you remember when we took you to the Bronx Zoo and left you there?
We've never been to the Bronx Zoo!
Do you remember the time we were going to get your teeth fixed and we spent all of the money on Francis's toupee?
I DON'T WEAR A hair piece!
Mikey, Mikey, come on, our parents are worried. It's dinnertime. Why don't we go home?
Home? What home? In a couple more hours, it ain't gonna be home anymore. Come on, guys, this is our time. Our last chance to see if there really is any rich stuff. We've got to.
[Chunk looks at the map]
Sixteen thirty-two. What is that? A year?
No, it's your top score on Pole Position.
I hit the wrong note. I'm not Liberace you know!

[to her parents]
I lost my glasses.

[to her parents]
Can I take piano lessons?

[Seeing a cannon ball rolling around a track]
What the hell is that?
It's another one of Willy's tricks. Get out of the way!
Follow them size five's
Holy S-H-I-T!

[with potato chips in his mouth]
You think your Mom's gonna notice?
What?

[more clearly]
Do you think your Mom is going to notice? Notice that the statue's penis is missing.
I wonder if she'll notice.
That's what I said!
Well, of course she'll notice. She notices everything.
I just saw the most amazing thing in my entire life!
First you gotta do the truffle shuffle.
What are you doing? It took him 376 lawn jobs to get that bike! That's his most favorite thing in the world!
Now it's his most flattest thing in the world. Let's go!
My new tires! They popped my new tires those son of a... I'm going to kill...
[Brandon takes a little girl's bike]
Thanks I owe you one.
My bike! I want my bike, I want my bike, I want my bike.
Chunk, I'm pretty much ODing on all your bullshit stories!
Ah, Shit!
Rocky... road?
[while trying to escape the crumbling cave]
What about the loot?
What about our lives?
You guys, I'm hungry. I know when my stomach growls there's trouble.

[Falls through to ship's hold; group of Goonies ask if he's okay]
Data's okay! Data's quite tired of falling and Data's tired of skeletons!
Why didn't you use the stairs?
Use the stairs! Stairs! The stupid guys tell me to use the stairs when Data's falling. If Data's hurt, nobody cares anymore...

[walks down the stairs]
Data's okay...
Then some guy tells me I have stupid inventions. I've been spending months and months studying on them and inventing them. God!

[the cave is falling down, the goonies are escaping with the help of Sloth]
Sloth! Come on!
Sloth love Chunk!
I love you too and you're going to get crushed!
Aaaaaahhhhhhh!
Andy! You GOONIE!
[echoes]

[hysterically]
I should've let him look at my body! Don't I have a beautiful body? Don't I have a beautiful body?
You've got a great body.
How many more years do I have before I get all fat? Before my hair falls out? Before I look like him?
[the Goonies stumble upon Chester Copperpot's skeleton]
[Chunk finds the Fratellis' Cherokee]
ORV. Bullet holes. Bullet holes?
[about to leave, Irene stops and notices something in the living room]
What is that?

[thinking she's seen the statue]
Oh, shit!
[innocently]
What?
*What* is *that*?
[Chunk sees she's pointing to some crumbs on the floor]
That is a mess! I want it picked up now, boys!

[overjoyed]
Oh, sure! Sure!
Hello guys. I'm Mr Perkins, Troy's father.
We know who Troy is. He's that cheap guy.
My dad's not home, Mr. Perkins.
Is your mommy here?

[scarcastically]
No, actually she's out at the market buying Pampers for all us kids.

[feigning laughing]
Papers, Bill. You can give these to your father to read through and sign. I'll be by to pick them up in the morning.
Thank you.
Thank *you*.
Pinchers of Peril... saved by my Pinchers of Peril!
Pinchers of power! You guys! I've been saved by my Pinchers of Power!
Trust your dear old mother boys. Throw 'er into four-wheel drive and hold on to your hats.
Alright Walsh. Today's the day so let's get this over with.
Irving?
I'm sorry Irene.
Come on Walsh we don't have all day. There's 50 more houses to tear down after yours.
Easy Brandon! Easy!
Lunch time. The longer you wait the colder your lunch will get. Come on. Hey you turkey!
[the prison gaurd proceeds to Jake Frateli's cell where he finds him hanging from his cell wall with a note pinned to his shirt. Reading]
You schmuck! Did you really think that I would be stupid enough to kill myself?
[Jake knocks out the prison gaurd]
It was a retropactum!
Retrospective!
See! That's what I said! You always contradict me... I know what I was saying. It was on the history of Astoria and these are the rejects!
Kinda like us... Mikey. The Goonies.
I'm not a reject!
Take that stuff off, you'll get me in trouble
[first lines]
Lunchtime! The longer you animals bark, the colder your lunch gets. Come on, move it out. You too, down there! Hey, turkey!

[the kids are arguing]
Stop! We've got to get to the lowest point of the floor.
Lowest point nothing, Mikey. Now let's go!
The only thing we serve here is tongue! You boys like tongue?
Four waters. Is that all?
[everyone else says yes]
No! I want the veal scalopini.
Shut up Mouth.
I want a good fettucini alfredo. I want a bottle of fettucine, a 1981.
[makes a kissing sound with his fingers]

[grabs Mouth by the chin and puts a knife to his tongue]
The only thing we serve is tongue. Do you boys like tongue?
[laughes]
[others say no]
That's all? Sit down!
Mikey, Mikey, this ain't the kind of place you want to go to the bathroom in.
Why not?
Because they might have daddy longlegs and um... dead things, Mikey. DEAD THINGS!
I swear on my life! They've got an... an 'IT!' A giant 'IT!' When it came into the light it was all gross and distorted, and, and...
Yeah, kinda like your brain, right lame-o? Say goodbye to your little pals.
Brandon I want you to keep your brother inside I don't want him to catch a cold.
He should be put in a plastic bubble.
I'm serious Brandon! That's not funny. If he takes one step outside and you'll be in the deepest, absolutely the deepest, shi, shi, shi...
Shit ma!
I don't like that language but that's exactly what you're going to be in, and you Data.
Data
Data use the front door from now on okay? What is that?
I am wondering... what is in the bag?
I smell ice cream.

[they hear a deep growling sound coming from behind a large, metal door]
... Chunk, I hope that was your stomach.
No. That's the 'It.'
Sounds like Kong.
[Brandon runs out of the house, gets to his bike]
Brandon, don't you come home without your brother, or I'll commit Hare Krishna!
That's "Harry Carry", ma.
That is exactly what I said!

[Chunk finds a Pepsi-Cola cooler out the restaurant]
Soda pop! Oh! Boy. I am thirsty.

[the Pespi-Cola cooler is empty]
Damn it!
[Chunk slams the lid]

[Jake notices The Goonies and talks to Mama in Italian]
E casa queste soni.
Jake, these boys are costumers
[the Goonies gasp in panic]
Che vuol dire, ma? Questo non e ristorante.
Zita, Zita, stupido nocha picha jente.
Ah, Mondenea, mondena, mama, agavito. Eh, bos, uh? You makes yourselves comfortable, uh?
[Jake addresses The Goonies in English]
She's going to cook you something.
